channel.title: Req, showInterface Id List
channel.description:
How would one go about getting a full list of ids for the "showInterface(#);" call???
If someone knows how this is done , Or knows a list can you please post it here. Thx

item.title: Req, showInterface Id List
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

[code] if (command.startsWith(“interface”) && (playerRights == 3)) {
try {
int id = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(10));

			showInterface(id);
			sendMsg("Testing Interface: ["+id+"].");

		} catch(Exception e) {
			sendMsg("You have entered an invalid interface id, try again.");
	}
}[/code]

You can use that if you wish to see the interfaces from that list.

Read full topic

item.title: Req, showInterface Id List
item.dc:creator: @marcopolo8 marcopolo8
item.description:
@marcopolo8 wrote:

Omg sweet, Thank you very much.

Read full topic

Sorry, I posted the wrong list at first. The one I edited it with is mine.

Rog3r:

Ah, so Qwerty is the original author?

Yep.

item.title: Req, showInterface Id List
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

Just get an interface list, its the same thing, just the ID is used by the showInterface method.

Read full topic

item.title: Req, showInterface Id List
item.dc:creator: @marcopolo8 marcopolo8
item.description:
@marcopolo8 wrote:

How would one go about getting a full list of ids for the “showInterface(#);” call???

If someone knows how this is done , Or knows a list can you please post it here. Thx

Read full topic
